Summary: looked like a star but too early
divs: Sighting Detailswe are visiting my mother in laws on the east side of tucson out on the back pattio about 6:15 I am looking up at a half moon tonight and then I spotted a bright object off to the left of the moon - we are facing east - about 4 fingers to the left of the moon with out streched arm. we watched it for 8 to 10 minutes through binocks & spotting scope = looked full round as apposed to half moon = brighter than the moon and then to my naked eye appeared to wink out. my father in law still had the scope on it and said it appeared to him to get smaller then gone. was stationary in sky the whole time.that is it. hope someone else saw it.nothing else in the sky as it was still light out.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around April 13th 2008
